Name: Dominion Elite Engineer
Description:
Basic work unit. Used for resource collection, building dominion structure and repair.

Can attack the ground.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Basic Structure and Advanced Structure List.
Root.Name: Build Structure

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

Root.Tooltip: Multiple SCVs can build a structure, reducing its construction time. Repair has no resource cost.
Root.Name: Advanced Construction

TBl1.Tooltip:
Basic Structure, used to receive collected resources. Can attack nearby ground and air units. Cannot Lift off

Allow:
- Dominion Elite Engineer
TBl1.Name: Build Dominion Planetary Fortress

TBl1.Tooltip: Improved refinery. Can deliver refined vespene gas directly to the command center via a short-distance warp field. Free the SCVs from the vespene gas production process.
TBl1.Name: Build Automated Refinery

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide supply for terran forces through airdrop.
Increase the unit number limit.
Lower the supply depot, allowing ground units to cross it.
TBl1.Name: Build Supply Depot

TBl1.Tooltip:
Dominion vehicle production facility.

Enable:
- Acadia Squadron
- Sentinel
- Aurora
- Kraken Prototype
TBl1.Name: Build Dominion Factory

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide upgrades for Korhal Fortress.

Enable:
- Korhal Fortress
TBl1.Name: Build Umojan Armory

TBl1.Tooltip: Science Facility co-established by Terran Dominion and Umojan Protectorate. It is used to develop advanced Terran military technology and provide tech support for dominion forces.
TBl1.Name: United Dominion Science Facility

TBl1.Tooltip:
Dominion air unit production facilities.

Enables:
-Emancipator
-Heaven Eye
TBl1.Name: Build Dominion Starport

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide upgrades for Terran Battlecarrier.

Enable:
- Terran Battlecarrier
TBl1.Name: Build Umojan Fusion Core
